attributes.action: David Cameron cannot renegotiate policy in the EU
attributes.additional_details: Cameron should prepare to leave the EU within the next year, because he cannot negotiate anything worthwhile for Britain.   He is just as much a Europhile as Nick Glegg & has made it clear he want to stay in Europe.  So the British people should have their say now and not in 3 years time "IF" he wins the next election?
